result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel William Wulff was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Daniel William Wulff is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Daniel William Wulff was found guilty of Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daniel William Wulff

defendant.name: Wulff, Daniel William
defendant.address: c/o Sheboygan County Detention Center, 2923 S. 31st Street, Sheboygan, WI 53081

records.addlTxt: As to: Daniel William Ruff re: Reminder Notice

1:40 PM Defendant Daniel William Wulff in court.  Attorney Zachary Derksen in court for Daniel William Wulff.  Prosecuting attorney Daniel j Gabler Mr. in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deft. did not call into scheduling conference on 7/26/22. Attorney Derksen informs the Court that Deft. was in custody at the Sheboygan County Jail at the time of the scheduling conference.
Plea questionnaire filed in court. Advised and waived rights.
Plea offer: Dismiss Count 1
Count 2- Deft. will enter a plea, Dismiss repeater enhancer. 
Deft. enters a Guilty plea on Count 2, Court finds Deft. Guilty. Court dismisses Count 1.
State recommending jail. Defense requesting time served plus court costs. 7 days credit.
Deft. makes a statement to the Court.
Court orders 7 days jail with 7 days credit. Court orders costs. Payment plan with 21CT342.
Status conference on August 19, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Standard Conditions
Additional Conditions: 
Not to consume alcoholic beverages, illegal drugs or possess drug paraphernalia. 
Not possess controlled substances except for those medications specifically prescribed for him/her by a health care professional. 
Not to possess needles/syringes except with a valid prescription. 
Comply with day reporting requirements  - UA's

11:39 AM Prosecuting attorney Daniel j Gabler Mr. in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Daniel William Wulff in court, in custody.  Attorney Zachary Derksen in court for Daniel William Wulff. Defense is requesting a signature bond, unable to post cash at this time. Defendant is scheduled to start treatment. Defendant has the opportunity to return to previous employer. PO hold to be lifted as defendant starts treatment. State does not object to the bond modification. Court amends bond to $1,000 signature bond.
Letter from DE to Judge requesting a bail bond hearing

ADDRESS INFO for Daniel William Wulff
Current: c/o Sheboygan County Detention Center, 2923 S. 31st Street, Sheboygan, WI 53081 United States  (Effective: 07-20-2022)
Prior: 340 Seifert Street, Adell, WI 53001
from Defendant to Court RE: advising of incarceration
Bail/bond hearing on July 25, 2022 at 11:30 am.
